Setup SSH keys

  1. Login as root
    1. If VIOS
      oem_setup_env
  2. Change root user's home directory
    mkdir -p /root
chuser "home=/root" root
  3. Relogin or just
    su -
  4. Create the .ssh folder
    ssh localhost

    Answer yes then CTRL+C

  5. Add these keys to the authorized keys. Login to taitc118
    sudo scp /root/.ssh/authorized_keys.master <host>:/root/.ssh/authorized_keys
  6. Test ssh from NIM server. Login to taitc118
    ssh <server> ls
